profile.name: Luis
profile.title: Software Architect | Quarkus
profile.description:
- Working as a Tech Lead in multiple clients with different technologies. Currently working with a Retail and Distribution spanish client.
- Developing Spring Boot APIs that implement a distribution billing platform which serve hundreds of thousands of users, with response times in milliseconds and with special care for transactions.
- Integrating new third-party APIs (from Whatsapp Business API to proprietary software) with our applications to be able to create more content and serve new customers.
- Using Quarkus, a Knative Java stack, to save memory and shorten microservices startup times, saving costs and improving horizontal scalability, serving hundreds of requests per second in comparison with a Jboss legacy application without the ability to scale that only serves a few requests per second.
- Developing Quarkus extensions for all the teams to use them.
- 2.6.0 of Quarkus. Experience in developing Quarkus extensions.
- English: Currently learning C1 (B2 Certification)
- Google Cloud Professional Architect Certificate:
https://cutt.ly/LgkoPkH
- Talk at University (Universidad de Oviedo) about microservices (and why we shouldn’t use it every time). In spanish language: https://youtu.be/dq7568Sjt1Q
- Talk at Quarkus Insights Episode 89 with the Red Hat Quarkus Engineer Team about our experience using Quarkus in native mode: https://youtu.be/mudqwT6l0Co
- Talk at Employment Forum (Foro de Empleo) about microservices (How to create a map of microservices)

organization.name: CITIPA - Colegio Oficial Graduados en Ingeniería Informática e Ingenieros Técnicos de Asturias
